Yakima.Yakima County Stadium:
Yakima County Stadium is a baseball stadium in the northwest United States, located in Yakima, Washington. Opened 25 years ago in 1993, it was the home field of the Yakima Bears minor league team for twenty seasons, and has a seating capacity of 2,800.
At the northwest corner of the Central Washington State Fairgrounds, it is north of the Yakima SunDome, separated by a parking lot.
